Description: Please read the description and look carefully at the pictures before bidding. If you have any questions, just send us a message. We will be glad to help you. Circa 1955 Harmony Stratotone Newport Electric Solidbody in good Condition!! Model H42/2. Metallic Green . Early One Piece Neck Thru Body Design. These were only produced from 1955-57 in Metallic Green (H42/2) and Sunshine Yellow (H42/1). A Rare Little Blues Guitar with Great Tone. Come with original case Inventory Items # 2018- 21 PLEASE NOTED THAT ALL ITEMS ARE PROFESSIONALLY PACKED , PLEASE BID WITH CONFIDENCE . ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Shipping We do combine shipping. Canada WE CHARGE SALES TAX FOR CANADIAN CUSTOMERS.
